active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the trade-offs of selecting a facility site in a remote area (lower cyber/physical threat density but potentially poor emergency services) versus an urban location (better services but higher risks). Use real-world examples and justify your position with risk metrics like response times.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

Incorporate: - Learning objectives: [insert full list above] - Scaffolding: [insert full 4 layers above] - Active learning ties: Reference in explanations. - Research context: Physical best practices (e.g., ASIS site selection guidelines, NFPA 4-6 min response benchmarks, GIS for proximity; integrate with BCP/risk assessment). Generate flashcards per schema: [insert full flashcard_schema above] Output ONLY a JSON array of flashcards: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': '...', 'source_context': '...'}}, ...].
